scripts.postinstall: node -e "if(process.platform==='linux'){process.env.PUPPETEER_PRODUCT='chrome';process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR=process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR||'/app/.cache/puppeteer';process.env.PUPPETEER_DOWNLOAD_PATH=process.env.PUPPETEER_DOWNLOAD_PATH||process.env.PUPPETEER_CACHE_DIR;require('child_process').execSync('npx puppeteer browsers install chrome@stable --platform=linux',{stdio:'inherit'});}else{console.log('Skipping Chrome install on non-Linux dev machine');}"
